K12D0594_H0538:218b-1: sarba ta th'a ga ta aushn'i sha bi dza ya n'a ma dh'a ra n'i kalpam hi ti /

K12D0594_H0538:219a-4: bya ba'i gzungs 'di bcang ba dang /

K12D0594_H0538:219a-15: par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bde bar gshegs
K12D0594_H0538:219a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan
K12D0594_H0538:219a-18: pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs te kun tu
K12D0594_H0538:219a-19: gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
K12D0594_H0538:219a-20: snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
K12D0594_H0538:219a-21: kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i
K12D0594_H0538:219a-23: aom na mo bha ga wa te /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-0: sarbba tree lo kya pra ti @219b bi shisht'a ya buddh'a ya te n'a ma /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-3: sho dha ya sho dha ya /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-4: bi sho dha ya bi sho dha ya /

K12D0594_H0538:219b-8: sarbba ta th'a ga t'a su ga ta ba ra ba tsa na /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-9: aa mri ta aa bhi she kee ra /

K12D0594_H0538:219b-11: ma ma a'a yu:sandha ra ni /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-12: sho dha ya sho dha ya /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-13: bi sho dha ya bi sho dha ya /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-14: ga ga na sva bh'a ba bi shuddhe /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-15: aushn'i sha bi dza ya pa ri shuddhe /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-16: sa ha sra rasmri sam tso di te /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-17: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa wa lo ki ni /

K12D0594_H0538:219b-19: sarbba ta th'a ga ta m'a te /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-20: da sha bh'u mi pra tishthi te /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-21: sarbba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya aa dhisht'a na aa dhishthi te /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-24: badzra k'a ya sam ha ta na /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-26: sarbba karma a'a wa ra na bi shuddhe /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-28: ma ma aa yur bi shuddhe /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-29: sarbba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya aa dhishtha na aa dhishthi te /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-32: bi mu ni bi mu ni /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-45: bi dza ya bi dza ya /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-48: spha ra ya spha ra ya /
K12D0594_H0538:219b-49: sarbba buddha aa dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te /
K12D0594_H0538:220a-0: badzra mbha ba tu ma ma sha r'i ram sarbba @220a *//
K12D0594_H0538:220a-1: sa tv'a n'anytsa k'a ya pa ri shuddhirbha bantu /
K12D0594_H0538:220a-2: sa d'a me sarbba ga ti pa ri shuddheshtsa /
K12D0594_H0538:220a-3: sarbba ta th'a ga t'a shtsa m'am sa ma shv'a sa yantu /
K12D0594_H0538:220a-6: bo dha ya bo dha ya; bi bo dha ya bi bo dha ya /
K12D0594_H0538:220a-7: mo tsa ya mo tsa ya /
K12D0594_H0538:220a-8: bi mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya /

K12D0594_H0538:220a-10: bi sho dha ya bi sho dha ya /

K12D0594_H0538:220a-12: sa manta rasmi pa ri shuddhe /

K12D0594_H0538:220a-17: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di ni /
K12D0594_H0538:220a-18: ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba /
K12D0594_H0538:220a-19: sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba /
K12D0594_H0538:220a-21: ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par 'jigs par byed pa 'di ni /
K12D0594_H0538:220a-22: sangs rgyas gang+g'a'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa /
K12D0594_H0538:220a-24: rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa /
K12D0594_H0538:220a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ste /
K12D0594_H0538:220a-26: sems can thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba dang /
K12D0594_H0538:220a-27: ngan 'gror ltung ba rnams bzlog pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:220a-30: gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi
K12D0594_H0538:220a-31: gnas thams cad du sdug bsngal zhing nyams bar gyur
K12D0594_H0538:220a-32: pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor ltung
K12D0594_H0538:220b-0: ba'i @220b sems can rnams rnam par grol bar bya
K12D0594_H0538:220b-2: de bzhin du sems can tshe thung zhing skal pa chung ba /
K12D0594_H0538:220b-4: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skye bar lhung ba rnams dang /
K12D0594_H0538:220b-6: sems can lam las nyams pa rnams kyi don du
K12D0594_H0538:220b-7: gzungs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du sems can rnams la
K12D0594_H0538:220b-9: sngags yongs su gtad pa yin no //
K12D0594_H0538:220b-11: khyod kyis yang dag par gzung bar bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:220b-13: gzungs 'di lan gcig thos ma thag tu bskal pa
K12D0594_H0538:220b-14: brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs
K12D0594_H0538:220b-16: skye bar skye ba sna tshogs pa sems can dmyal ba dang /
K12D0594_H0538:220b-20: lha ma yin gyi ris dang /
K12D0594_H0538:220b-37: grog sbur la sogs pa srog chags kyi rigs rnams su phyis mi skye bar rig par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:220b-38: gzhan du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:220b-39: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su skye ba dang /
K12D0594_H0538:220b-40: rigs chen por skye ba ste /
K12D0594_H0538:220b-41: de la rigs chen po ni /
K12D0594_H0538:221a-1: ste; bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'am /
K12D0594_H0538:221a-2: rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'am /
K12D0594_H0538:221a-3: khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'am /
K12D0594_H0538:221a-4: tshong dpon gyi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bur skye'o zhes pa smra'o //
K12D0594_H0538:221a-6: de ltar na gzungs 'di'i mthus byang chub kyi snying
K12D0594_H0538:221a-7: po'i mthar thug gi bar du skye ba yongs su
K12D0594_H0538:221a-14: dge ba shis pa yin te /
K12D0594_H0538:221a-16: sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gtsug tor rnam
K12D0594_H0538:221a-17: par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams
K12D0594_H0538:221a-18: cad yongs su sbyong ba 'di gzhag go /
K12D0594_H0538:221a-21: nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po shin
K12D0594_H0538:221a-22: tu dri ma med pa nam mkha' ltar yongs su
K12D0594_H0538:221a-24: 'od zer gyi snang bas 'bar zhing 'dug go /
K12D0594_H0538:221a-26: de bzhin du sems can de yang gos pa med par shes par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:221a-29: 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser shin tu dri ma med pa /
K12D0594_H0538:221a-34: de bzhin du sems can chen po de yang shin tu yongs su dag par rig par bya ste /
K12D0594_H0538:221a-35: tshe rabs gzhan du yang de bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:221a-37: gang na gzungs 'di rab tu ston pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:221b-0: bye brag tu na yi ge @221b 'brir 'jug pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:221b-4: kha ton du byed pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:221b-6: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:221b-8: 'dzin par 'gyur ba de 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:221b-9: sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:221b-11: gzungs 'di yi ger bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor gzhag par bya /
K12D0594_H0538:221b-14: mchod rten gyi nang du gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:221b-20: de las gzhan pa rigs kyi bu'am /
K12D0594_H0538:221b-21: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bzhag pa mthong ngam /
K12D0594_H0538:221b-22: de dang nye bar gnas par gyur na /
K12D0594_H0538:221b-23: tha na de'i grib mas phog gam /
K12D0594_H0538:221b-24: de'i rdul rlung gis btab pa phog na yang lha'i dbang po /
K12D0594_H0538:221b-25: sems can de la sdig pa thams cad dang /
K12D0594_H0538:221b-26: ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
K12D0594_H0538:221b-31: lha ma yin gyi ris thams cad du mi skye bar rig par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:221b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan cing
K12D0594_H0538:221b-35: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K12D0594_H0538:221b-36: chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bya na
K12D0594_H0538:221b-38: shing bzo byed pa la yang phan yon chen por 'gyur na /
K12D0594_H0538:222a-11: rgyan rnams kyis brgyan par byed pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:222a-12: lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten byas la gzungs 'di bzhag la thal mo sbyor ba'am /
K12D0594_H0538:222a-14: bskor ba byed pa lta ci smos te /
K12D0594_H0538:222a-17: sems can chen po yin par rig par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:222a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su rig par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:222a-19: chos kyi gnas su rig par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:222a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du rig par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:222a-21: de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje de'i nub
K12D0594_H0538:222a-22: mo de nam nangs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la
K12D0594_H0538:222a-23: ba der song ste bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me
K12D0594_H0538:222a-25: rgyan la sogs pas mchod pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:222a-26: bsti stang du byas nas des bcom ldan 'das la
K12D0594_H0538:222a-27: lan bdun bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi
K12D0594_H0538:222a-28: zhabs la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0594_H0538:222a-31: mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lags te /
K12D0594_H0538:222a-33: bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can
K12D0594_H0538:222a-34: de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing dus kun tu srung ba
K12D0594_H0538:222a-35: dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o //
K12D0594_H0538:222a-36: sems can dmyal ba thams cad las de bzlog par bgyi'o //
K12D0594_H0538:222b-2: byas pa gzo bar bgyid kyi /
K12D0594_H0538:222b-3: byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyid do //
K12D0594_H0538:222b-4: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das
K12D0594_H0538:222b-5: la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das
K12D0594_H0538:222b-8: gzungs 'di'i cho ga zhib mo dang /
K12D0594_H0538:222b-9: bgyi ba'i cho ga'i tshul rgyas par bshad du gsol /
K12D0594_H0538:222b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po
K12D0594_H0538:222b-11: bzhi po dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to
K12D0594_H0538:222b-12: // nyon cig dang gzungs 'di'i bya ba'i cho ga'i tshul bshad par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:222b-13: sems can tshe thung ba'i don gyi phyir rigs kyi bu'am /
K12D0594_H0538:222b-14: rigs kyi bu mos tshes bco lnga'i zla ba la
K12D0594_H0538:222b-15: khrus byas te gos gtsang ma gon nas smyung ba
K12D0594_H0538:222b-16: byas te lan stong bzlas brjod byas na /
K12D0594_H0538:222b-17: de sems can tshe zad pa de yang phyir nur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:222b-19: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:222b-20: sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:222b-21: tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog
K12D0594_H0538:222b-22: chags bya'i rna lam du yang gzungs 'di'i sgra bsgrag
K12D0594_H0538:222b-24: de'i ngan 'gro [?] 'di nyid tha ma yin par rig par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:222b-25: gang zhig nad chen pos btab ste sman pa rnams
K12D0594_H0538:222b-26: kyis bye brag phye ste bor ba yang de ltar
K12D0594_H0538:222b-27: na nad de las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro
K12D0594_H0538:222b-29: ngan 'gror skye ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:223a-1: kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:223a-2: de nyid de'i mngal gyi gnas tha ma yin par shes par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:223a-3: de gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der
K12D0594_H0538:223a-4: padma'i snying po kho na las brdzus te skye bar
K12D0594_H0538:223a-5: 'gyur ro // tshe rabs thams cad du yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:223a-6: sems can sdig pa byed pa gang dag 'chi ba'i
K12D0594_H0538:223a-7: dus byas pa de dag gi don du gzungs 'di
K12D0594_H0538:223a-8: yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su
K12D0594_H0538:223a-9: brjod de dag gi rus gong rnams kyi steng na
K12D0594_H0538:223a-10: gtor na / de dag sems can dmyal ba'am /
K12D0594_H0538:223a-14: de las gzhan pa'i ngan 'gro rnams su skyes par gyur kyang rung ste /
K12D0594_H0538:223a-15: de dag gzungs 'di'i mthus ngan 'gro de dag las thar nas kyang lhar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:223a-16: su zhig 'di nyin gcig bzhin du lan nyi shu
K12D0594_H0538:223a-17: rtsa gcig rtsa gcig yongs su brjod pa de 'jig
K12D0594_H0538:223a-18: rten pa chen po rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'os su
K12D0594_H0538:223a-22: rtag tu spro ba dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:223a-23: mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:223a-24: shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:223a-25: de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa tha dad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:223b-0: der yang de bzhin gshegs @223b pa rnams dang 'phrad par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:223b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:223b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung ston par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:223b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang 'jig rten la snang ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:223b-5: sor mo bcu'i thal mo la sdigs mdzub gnyis bkug ste mthe bong gnyis dang sbyar la /
K12D0594_H0538:223b-6: de nas gzungs 'di dran par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:223b-7: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te me tog sna
K12D0594_H0538:223b-8: tshogs bkram la sna tshogs pa'i bdug pas bdug cing
K12D0594_H0538:223b-9: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te
K12D0594_H0538:223b-10: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dmigs la phyag bya zhing /
K12D0594_H0538:223b-11: de nas gzungs brgyad brgya bklag par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:223b-12: de ltar lan gcig bklags pa tsam gyis bye ba
K12D0594_H0538:223b-13: khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi
K12D0594_H0538:223b-14: gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin
K12D0594_H0538:223b-15: gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing bsnyen bkur dang
K12D0594_H0538:223b-16: / ri mor byas pa ste; de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0594_H0538:223b-17: thams cad la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod
K12D0594_H0538:223b-18: / par 'gyur ro // de kun gyis kyang legs so //
K12D0594_H0538:223b-19: zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:223b-20: sems can de ni; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
K12D0594_H0538:223b-21: kyi bdag nyid las skyes pa'i sras su rig par
K12D0594_H0538:223b-22: bya'o // sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan
K12D0594_H0538:223b-23: zhing byang chub chen po'i sems kyi rgyan dang mnyam
K12D0594_H0538:224a-1: de la gzungs sgrub pa'i cho ga'i thabs 'dis ni /
K12D0594_H0538:224a-3: 'gro ba thams cad sems can dmyal ba la sogs
K12D0594_H0538:224a-4: pa'i ngan 'gro las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro
K12D0594_H0538:224a-5: // de dag gi 'gro ba thams cad kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:224a-8: song la lha'i bu blo gros shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di rjes su ston la sgrogs shig /
K12D0594_H0538:224a-10: des na zhag bdun na lha'i bu shin tu brtan
K12D0594_H0538:224a-11: pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag cing tshe
K12D0594_H0538:224a-12: ring bar 'gyur ro; ;stobs che bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:224a-13: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin
K12D0594_H0538:224a-14: gshegs pa las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs te
K12D0594_H0538:224a-15: de'i gnas su phyin nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan
K12D0594_H0538:224a-17: de nas lha'i bu des nyi ma bdun pa'i bar
K12D0594_H0538:224a-18: du nyin drug mtshan drug tu gzungs 'di la brtson
K12D0594_H0538:224a-19: par byas nas de'i bsam pa thams cad phun sum
K12D0594_H0538:224a-23: bde ba'i lam la yang dag gnas /
K12D0594_H0538:224a-24: tshe ring bar gyur nas aa la la sangs rgyas /
K12D0594_H0538:224a-26: aa la la gzungs 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ste /
K12D0594_H0538:224a-27: des bdag 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su thar to //
K12D0594_H0538:224a-28: zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K12D0594_H0538:224a-29: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /
K12D0594_H0538:224b-0: lha'i bu shin @224b tu brtan pa 'khor che ba rnams kyis me tog dang /
K12D0594_H0538:224b-7: gos kyi rgyan bzang po'i bla re dang /
K12D0594_H0538:224b-8: lha'i tshogs kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin te tha dad du phyin pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:224b-9: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po lha rdzas
K12D0594_H0538:224b-10: kyi gos kyi rgyan la sogs pa nye bar mkho
K12D0594_H0538:224b-11: ba'i mchod pa brgya stong phul te bskor ba byas
K12D0594_H0538:224b-12: nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste /
K12D0594_H0538:224b-13: de bzhin du ched du brjod pa byas nas bcom
K12D0594_H0538:224b-14: ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste chos nyan to
K12D0594_H0538:224b-15: // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi
K12D0594_H0538:224b-16: mdog can brkyangs te lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa
K12D0594_H0538:224b-17: dbugs phyang nas chos ston par byed cing sangs rgyas
K12D0594_H0538:224b-18: kyi bar du lung bstan to //
K12D0594_H0538:224b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs 'di ni /
K12D0594_H0538:224b-21: 'chi ba chen po'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa ste /
K12D0594_H0538:224b-22: dag byed sdig pa 'joms par byed pa 'di gro
K12D0594_H0538:224b-23: ga'am gzhan zhig la bris te mchod rten gyi nang
K12D0594_H0538:224b-24: du bzhag la rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa
K12D0594_H0538:224b-25: ji ltar 'byor pas mchod de bskor ba stong phrag
K12D0594_H0538:224b-26: brgya byas na / mchog gi tshe dang blo rno ba sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:224b-27: de ltar byas pas zhag bdun pa'i tshe ni /
K12D0594_H0538:224b-31: de ltar mchog gi tshe thob cing dran pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:225a-0: @225a *// mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol nas mgo la bcings na /
K12D0594_H0538:225a-1: nad chen po las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:225a-2: gos sam shing shun la gi wang gis rang gi
K12D0594_H0538:225a-3: ming dang bcas par gzungs bris te tsandan gyi rang
K12D0594_H0538:225a-4: bzhin gyi mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol te rang
K12D0594_H0538:225a-5: gi khyim du bzhag la rgya che ba'i stong gi
K12D0594_H0538:225a-6: mchod pas mchod de zla ba re re zhing brgya
K12D0594_H0538:225a-7: phrag brgyad kyis bzlas pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga byas
K12D0594_H0538:225a-8: na / nad las grol zhing lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:225a-9: med na 'dam pa'i rang bzhin la yang bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:225a-10: yang gos gtsang ma la sna tshogs rdo rje la
K12D0594_H0538:225a-11: gnas pa'i mchod rten bris la rdo rje phreng bas
K12D0594_H0538:225a-12: bskor bas brgyan pa de'i nang du rang gi ming
K12D0594_H0538:225a-13: dang gzungs kyi tshig 'di gi wang gis bris la
K12D0594_H0538:225a-14: kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhugs su gsol
K12D0594_H0538:225a-15: te rang gi khyim du bzhag la mchod pa rgya
K12D0594_H0538:225a-16: chen pos mchod pa byas na /
K12D0594_H0538:225a-19: sa la ma ltung ba'i lce bas mandal gru bzhir
K12D0594_H0538:225a-20: byas la me tog dkar por bkram ste mtshams bzhir
K12D0594_H0538:225a-21: zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la aa ga
K12D0594_H0538:225a-22: ru dang du ru ka'i bdug pa byas la /
K12D0594_H0538:225a-23: de bzhin du dri chus gang ba'i snod me tog
K12D0594_H0538:225a-24: dkar pos brgyan te gzungs kyi snying po can gyi
K12D0594_H0538:225a-25: mchod rten nam / sku gzugs dbus su bzhugs su gsol la /
K12D0594_H0538:225b-0: de la g-yon pa'i lag pas reg ste @225b g-yas
K12D0594_H0538:225b-1: pa'i lag pa phreng ba 'dzin pas nyi ma re
K12D0594_H0538:225b-2: re zhing lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig dus
K12D0594_H0538:225b-3: gsum du bzlas pa byas la de'i chu khyor ba
K12D0594_H0538:225b-4: gsum 'thungs na / nad med pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:225b-6: dgra yongs su nyams pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:225b-9: skye ba nas skye bar skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:225b-12: rta'i ra ba'am; rgyal po'i khab tu gtor na /
K12D0594_H0538:225b-16: srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing nad kyis yongs su gdungs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:225b-18: de nad de las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:225b-19: de ltar tshe dpag tu med pa'i phan yon che
K12D0594_H0538:225b-20: ba'i gzungs 'di gang dang gang du rab tu sbyar
K12D0594_H0538:225b-21: na / de dang de ru zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:225b-22: sa shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te 'chos na /
K12D0594_H0538:225b-26: chu khyor ba gsum la dus gsum du lan nyi
K12D0594_H0538:225b-27: shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te 'thungs
K12D0594_H0538:225b-28: na / nad thams cad las yongs su grol zhing yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:225b-29: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems sems dpa' chen
K12D0594_H0538:225b-30: po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom
K12D0594_H0538:225b-31: ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la bskor ba
K12D0594_H0538:225b-32: byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0594_H0538:226a-0: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos mchod @226a *//
K12D0594_H0538:226a-1: rten gyi las ji ltar bya /
K12D0594_H0538:226a-2: sku gzugs la sogs pa sgrub pa ji ltar bya /
K12D0594_H0538:226a-3: 'dir sbyin sreg kyang ji ltar bgyi /
K12D0594_H0538:226a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0594_H0538:226a-5: dri ba legs par smras pa ni //
K12D0594_H0538:226a-6: dpa' bo chen po legs so legs //
K12D0594_H0538:226a-7: sems can kun la phan brtse'i phyir //
K12D0594_H0538:226a-8: 'dir ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon //
K12D0594_H0538:226a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od dpag tu
K12D0594_H0538:226a-10: med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
K12D0594_H0538:226a-11: snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
K12D0594_H0538:226a-12: kyi tshe dpag tu med pa ces bya ba'i gzungs
K12D0594_H0538:226a-17: aa mi ta sam bha we /
K12D0594_H0538:226a-20: aa mi ta g'a mi ni /
K12D0594_H0538:226a-21: aa mi ta a'a yurda de /
K12D0594_H0538:226a-22: ga ga na k'irti ka re /
K12D0594_H0538:226a-23: sarba kle shaksha yam ka ri ye sv'ah'a /
K12D0594_H0538:226a-24: zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'dis mchod rten byed pa'i 'jim pa blang ba dang /
K12D0594_H0538:226a-25: byug pa la sogs pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:226a-26: gdugs gdags pa'i bar ji snyed rdzogs par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:226a-28: mchod rten cho ga mchog gyur pa //
K12D0594_H0538:226a-29: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12D0594_H0538:226a-33: padma r'a ga la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mang ba'i
K12D0594_H0538:226a-34: rin po ches spras pa'i sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad
K12D0594_H0538:226a-36: de'i logs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi lag na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o //
K12D0594_H0538:226b-2: dri lag na bzung ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang /
K12D0594_H0538:226b-3: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lag na gdugs bsnams pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:226b-4: g-yas dang g-yon gyi logs gnyis na spyan ras gzigs dang /
K12D0594_H0538:226b-5: rdo rje 'chang gnyis rnga yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa gnyis bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:226b-6: de lta bu'i cho gas mchod rten la g-yas bskor
K12D0594_H0538:226b-7: gyi sbyor bas padma'i 'dab ma la bri bar bya'o
K12D0594_H0538:226b-8: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor
K12D0594_H0538:226b-9: rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bris la
K12D0594_H0538:226b-10: de'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can du byas te
K12D0594_H0538:226b-11: // / dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chus gtor zhing dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod la /
K12D0594_H0538:226b-12: stong phrag gcig gis mchod pa byas te dkar po'i
K12D0594_H0538:226b-13: phyogs kyi tshes brgyad kyi nyin zhag la smyung bar
K12D0594_H0538:226b-14: gnas shing / sems can thams cad la phan pa'i
K12D0594_H0538:226b-15: blos tshe dang blo ster ba'i yon byin te stong
K12D0594_H0538:226b-17: zla ba re re zhing byas na /
K12D0594_H0538:226b-18: zla ba drug gis tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:226b-19: rtag tu lo gcig tu byas na tshe lo 'bum thub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:226b-21: tshe lo mi zad pa thub cing stobs dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:226b-22: gang gis kyang mi thub cing lha dang lha ma
K12D0594_H0538:226b-23: yin dang mi mnyam pa'i mkha' spyod kyi gtsug tor
K12D0594_H0538:226b-25: de nas gzhan yang cho ga ni /
K12D0594_H0538:226b-26: rab tu dge ba'i gnas su sa blangs la dri zhim pos bsres la mchod rten bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:227a-1: nas brtsams te ji srid la'am gcig gi bar du'o //
K12D0594_H0538:227a-2: nyi ma re re zhing mchod rten du gtogs pa
K12D0594_H0538:227a-3: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba yang dag par bzhugs
K12D0594_H0538:227a-4: su gsol la / ji skad gsungs pa'i mchod pa
K12D0594_H0538:227a-5: rgya chen po byas la stong phrag gcig nas brtsams
K12D0594_H0538:227a-6: te lan bdun gyi bar du bklag par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:227a-7: nyi ma re re zhing tshe dang blo ster bar byed pa'i gzungs kyi ched du byas te /
K12D0594_H0538:227a-8: sems can thams cad la thun mong du dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:227a-9: sems can rnams la bcing ba dang brdung ba la sogs pa spang bar bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:227a-10: zla ba gzhan re re la mchod pa nyis 'gyur
K12D0594_H0538:227a-11: du byas la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya ba ni
K12D0594_H0538:227a-12: / rang ngam rang dang 'dra bas bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:227a-14: dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:227a-17: tshe lo brgya thub cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang /
K12D0594_H0538:227a-19: gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de'i tshe
K12D0594_H0538:227a-20: sbrul shun pa brjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi
K12D0594_H0538:227a-21: lus por te mdzes pa'i lus bde ba can gyi
K12D0594_H0538:227a-22: 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:227a-23: yang de nyid dmyal ba dang /
K12D0594_H0538:227a-24: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K12D0594_H0538:227a-25: gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:227a-26: rna ba'i bug par dmyal ba'i sgra yang thos par mi 'gyur na /
K12D0594_H0538:227a-27: 'bras bu smin par lta ga la 'gyur /
K12D0594_H0538:227b-0: @227b 'di rnams kyi gnas su 'gro ba med do //
K12D0594_H0538:227b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pas gzhan yang sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal pa /
K12D0594_H0538:227b-2: gang gis sems can tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0594_H0538:227b-3: nyam nga ba'i 'khor ba las grol bar byed pa ni /
K12D0594_H0538:227b-4: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa tshad dang ldan pa mdzes pa'i ras mkhas pas bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:227b-5: de nas gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya
K12D0594_H0538:227b-6: ba'i gzungs tshon sna ma lus pas gzungs kyi yi
K12D0594_H0538:227b-7: ge las sprul pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bri
K12D0594_H0538:227b-8: bar bya'o // tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer
K12D0594_H0538:227b-9: stong gi phreng ba can padma dang zla ba'i gdan
K12D0594_H0538:227b-10: bar bya'o // la bzhugs pa / ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od can /
K12D0594_H0538:227b-11: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12D0594_H0538:227b-15: g-yas pa'i zhal zhi ba gser gyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'o //
K12D0594_H0538:227b-17: mche bas ma mchu mnan pa mi bzad pa autpa
K12D0594_H0538:227b-18: la sngon po'i 'od zer gyi 'od dang ldan pa'o
K12D0594_H0538:227b-20: sgeg pa dang bcas shing dkar po'o //
K12D0594_H0538:227b-21: g-yas pa'i phyag gis snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
K12D0594_H0538:227b-22: de bzhin du padma la gnas pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:227b-24: g-yon du sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:227b-28: yang mgo bor mchod rten la gnas pa'i aom dang /
K12D0594_H0538:228a-2: rkang pa gnyis la aam aa:yi ge 'di rnams bkod
K12D0594_H0538:228a-3: la raksha sv'ah'a dang bcas pa 'di'i nang du rang
K12D0594_H0538:228a-5: de'i logs gnyis su padma dang /
K12D0594_H0538:228a-6: rdo rje 'chang gi gnyis rnga yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa'o //
K12D0594_H0538:228a-7: steng du bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun 'bebs bzhin pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i bu gnyis so //
K12D0594_H0538:228a-8: logs bzhir khro bo mi g-yo ba dang /
K12D0594_H0538:228a-10: dbyug pa sngon po can dang /
K12D0594_H0538:228a-11: stobs po che zhes bya ba ste /
K12D0594_H0538:228a-17: gdug pa can 'jigs pa'i sdigs mdzub phyed du byed pa'o //
K12D0594_H0538:228a-18: de ltar 'bad pas rdzogs par byas la ring bsrel
K12D0594_H0538:228a-19: dang bcas pa'i mchod rten de la smyung bar gnas
K12D0594_H0538:228a-20: pas mchod pa chen po stong phrag gcig gis mchod
K12D0594_H0538:228a-21: pa byas la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:228a-22: de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas bzung
K12D0594_H0538:228a-23: ste ji srid bco lnga'i bar du stong stong bzlas
K12D0594_H0538:228a-24: pa bya'o // de nas snga bar nam nangs pa
K12D0594_H0538:228a-25: dang bcom ldan 'das ma zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro
K12D0594_H0538:228a-26: pa bya'o // // de nas ji ltar dngos grub 'dod pa ster ro; ;yang na ni /
K12D0594_H0538:228a-27: thang ga de dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chus
K12D0594_H0538:228a-28: byugs pa'i phyogs gcig tu yang dag par bzhugs su
K12D0594_H0538:228a-29: gsol la mchod pa rgya chen po bya zhing nyi
K12D0594_H0538:228b-0: ma re re zhing brgyad @228b brgya bzlas pa bya'o
K12D0594_H0538:228b-1: // yang zla ba re re la stong stong gi
K12D0594_H0538:228b-2: mchod pa bya zhing stong stong gi bzlas pa byas
K12D0594_H0538:228b-3: // na / tshe dpag tu med pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:228b-4: stobs dpag tu med pa gnon pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:228b-6: nad chen po med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:228b-7: sems can thams cad kyi nyi ma re re tshigs
K12D0594_H0538:228b-8: bcad stong 'dzin pa'i phyin ci ma log pa'i ngag
K12D0594_H0538:228b-9: tu 'gyur ro // yang na kha cig gis de lta bu byed par mi nus na /
K12D0594_H0538:228b-10: de'i sa rang gi khyim du dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i sa'i char bzhugs su gsol la /
K12D0594_H0538:228b-11: ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas la zla ba
K12D0594_H0538:228b-12: 'ong ngo cog gi tshes brgyad la brgyad brgya'i bzlas
K12D0594_H0538:228b-13: pa bya zhing nyi ma re re dus gsum du
K12D0594_H0538:228b-14: nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig brjod na /
K12D0594_H0538:228b-17: shes rab dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:228b-22: yang na rang gis ma nus na /
K12D0594_H0538:228b-23: de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na tshe ring ba dang /
K12D0594_H0538:228b-25: de nas gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi cho ga sems
K12D0594_H0538:228b-26: can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir nye bar bshad
K12D0594_H0538:228b-27: par bya ste / khru gang gi tshad kyi thab khung zlum po rdo rje'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
K12D0594_H0538:228b-28: tsandan dkar po'am sa dkar gyis byugs la me tog
K12D0594_H0538:228b-29: dkar po bkram ste logs bzhir zhun mar gyi mar
K12D0594_H0538:228b-31: bdug spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la
K12D0594_H0538:228b-32: phyogs bzhir mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa rab
K12D0594_H0538:229a-0: tu mdzes pa gos dkar pos @229a *//
K12D0594_H0538:229a-1: g-yogs pa yal gas kha brgyan pa dgod par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:229a-2: 'o ma can gyi yam shing la me sbar la
K12D0594_H0538:229a-3: der me lha bkug ste dgang blugs gsum byin la
K12D0594_H0538:229a-4: bsang gtor byas te gshegs su gsol lo //
K12D0594_H0538:229a-5: de nas tshe dpag tu med pa gsal por thab
K12D0594_H0538:229a-6: khung gi dbus su bsams la gtsug tor rnam par
K12D0594_H0538:229a-7: rgyal ba bzlas shing dgang blugs gsum dbul lo //
K12D0594_H0538:229a-8: yang na aom aa mi ta aa yurda de sv'ah'a zhes bya bas tshe dang /
K12D0594_H0538:229a-9: blo rno ba dang bcas pas brgyad brgya dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:229a-10: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba lan bdun du bzlas pa byas na /
K12D0594_H0538:229a-15: yang na zla ba re re'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi
K12D0594_H0538:229a-16: tshes brgyad la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la
K12D0594_H0538:229a-17: dus gsum du tshe lo stong thub par 'dod pas
K12D0594_H0538:229a-19: mchog gi tshe ring ba dang /
K12D0594_H0538:229a-20: blo rno ba sbyin par byed do //
K12D0594_H0538:229a-21: sems can rnams la smad par mi bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:229a-22: cho ga 'dis rang gi lus nad kyis gos par
K12D0594_H0538:229a-23: mi 'gyur ro; ;lo brgya lnga bcur 'tsho ba dang
K12D0594_H0538:229a-27: gal te rang gis ma nus na /
K12D0594_H0538:229a-28: de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:229a-29: de nas gzhan yang sgrub par 'dod na /
K12D0594_H0538:229a-30: gtsug tor gyi rgyal po chen po tshe dang blo
K12D0594_H0538:229a-31: rno ba dang bcas par 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg
K12D0594_H0538:229b-0: byas na / dang po dang mthar @229b stong stong gi mchod pa byas la /
K12D0594_H0538:229b-1: yang 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas na /
K12D0594_H0538:229b-2: tshe lo 'bum phrag gcig thub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:229b-5: de ltar 'di'i cho ga'i rim pas tshe lo dpag tu med par 'gyur te /
K12D0594_H0538:229b-10: dpal 'bras 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na /
K12D0594_H0538:229b-11: dpal chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:229b-13: padma 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na /
K12D0594_H0538:229b-14: rgyal po chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:229b-16: 'khor los bsgyur ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:229b-17: yang na ral gri la sogs pa grub par 'dod na /
K12D0594_H0538:229b-18: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du
K12D0594_H0538:229b-19: thang sku bkram la stong gi mchod pa chen pos
K12D0594_H0538:229b-20: mchod la bzlas pa 'bum byas te /
K12D0594_H0538:229b-21: yang lcags lda'i rang bzhin gyi ral gri la bzlas
K12D0594_H0538:229b-22: pa 'bum byas te lag pa g-yas par bcangs na
K12D0594_H0538:229b-25: stobs che zhing gzhan gnon pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:229b-26: sems can thams cad gcig tu 'dren pa por gyur
K12D0594_H0538:229b-27: nas sman pa chen po'i mchog tshe dpag tu med
K12D0594_H0538:229b-28: par 'gyur ro // de ltar rdo rje dang /
K12D0594_H0538:229b-30: rtse gsum la sogs pa la yang bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0594_H0538:229b-31: de ltar phan yon dpag tu med pa'i gzungs chen po /
K12D0594_H0538:229b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa /
K12D0594_H0538:230a-0: mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di ji lta ji @230a *//
K12D0594_H0538:230a-1: ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar las 'grub par byed do //
K12D0594_H0538:230a-2: gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug
K12D0594_H0538:230a-3: tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di
K12D0594_H0538:230a-4: nyi ma re re la dus gsum du lan nyi
K12D0594_H0538:230a-5: shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bya zhing /
K12D0594_H0538:230a-6: mchod rten chen po byas te yang dag par bcangs
K12D0594_H0538:230a-7: la gzhan la yang rgya cher gsal bar byas na
K12D0594_H0538:230a-8: / de skyid pa thob cing stobs dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:230a-13: gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i tshe
K12D0594_H0538:230a-14: sbrul shun pa brjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi
K12D0594_H0538:230a-15: lus bor te bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi
K12D0594_H0538:230a-17: dmyal ba'i sgra rna bug tu yang thos par mi 'gyur na /
K12D0594_H0538:230a-19: gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de ru skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12D0594_H0538:230a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12D0594_H0538:230a-21: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K12D0594_H0538:230a-25: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom
K12D0594_H0538:230a-26: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do
K12D0594_H0538:230a-27: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor
K12D0594_H0538:230a-28: rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa
K12D0594_H0538:230a-30: pandi ta chos kyi sde dang /
